data_sources.title: List and manage your data sources

not_found.title: You have no Data Sources yet
not_found.text: Click "Add Data Source" to add one

not_found.title: You have no members yet
not_found.text: Please invite members for manage roles.

not_found.title: You have no SQL API credentials
not_found.text: Please set up your API credentials

credentials.title: Manage Credentials
credentials.shared_access_type_description: This credential will be available to all team members.
credentials.specific_users_access_type_description: This credential will be available to the selected team members.
credentials.member_already_used: One or more members already have access to this datasource. Please remove them from other credentials of this datasource.
credentials.member_has_access: You already have access to this datasource. Please remove other credentials of this datasource or contact your administrator.
credentials.no_rights: You don't have rights to delete this credential. Please contact your administrator.

labels.2: 2. Set access to data source resources
